adjectives.description: anticourtier (comparative more anticourtier, superlative most anticourtier)

examples: The grammatical structure of the poem expresses the idea already found in a more fully developed form in the Philosophe de Court, namely, that much anticourtier literature of this period was based on the notion of a complete system, an ars, which could be learned at will by those ready to abandon traditional standards and values.
